title: Optimization Engine Dashboard
description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for the Optimization Engine service of the AI-driven Freight Optimization Platform. Tracks optimization job performance, Smart Hub identification, relay planning, ML model metrics, and resource utilization to ensure the Optimization Engine meets its SLA requirements of 99.5% availability and p95 < 5s job processing time.
